item.title: Lou Reed - Walk On The Wild Side
item.description:
Holly came
from Miami Fla
Hitch-hiked her way
across the USA
Plucked her eyebrows
on the way
Shaved her legs and
then he was a she
She says
Hey Babe
take a walk
on the wild side
She said
Hey Honey
take a walk
on the wild side

Candy came from out
on the island
In the
backroom
she was everybody’s
darlin’
But she never
lost her head
Even when
she was givin’ head
She says
Hey Babe
take a walk
on the wild side
Said Hey
Babe
take a walk
on the wild side
And the
colored girls go
doot do doot
do doot
do doot do
doot do doot
do doot
do doot do
doot do doot
do doot
do doot do
do doot do
do doot
do doot do

Little Joe never
once gave it away
Everybody
had to pay and pay
A hustle here and
a hustle there
New York city’s
the place where
they said
Hey Babe
take a walk
on the wild side
I said
Hey Joe
take a walk
on the wild side

Sugarplum Fairy came
and hit the streets
Lookin’ for soul food
and a place to eat
Went to the
Apollo should have
seen him
go go go
They said
Hey Sugar
take a walk
on the wild side
I said
Hey Babe
take a walk
on the wild side
All
right

Jokie’s just
feedin’ away
Thought she was
James Dean for a day
Then I guess
she had to crash
A valley would
have helped that pass
She said
Hey Babe
take a walk
on the wild side
I said
Hey Honey
take a walk
on the wild side
And the
colored girls say
doot do doot
do doot
do doot do
doot do
doot do doot
do doot
do doot do
doot do
doot do doot
do doot
do doot do
doot do
doot
do
